text: Youxie ren, zai an la zhi wai, bie you chongbai, dangzuo an la de pidi; tamen jing'ai naxie pidi, xiang jing'ai an la yiyang——xindao de renmen, duiyu jing'ai an la, youwei ken zhi——dang bu yi de ren kanjian xingfa de shihou, jiaruo tamen zhidao yiqie nengli dou shi an la de, an la shi xingfa yanli de……
